u.a: <1w> pushes dollhouse back . <1w> takes bed out of dollhouse and puts down by Ruth .
<1w> takes another bed out of dollhouse and puts down by first bed

<bef> takes man from Mother and puts in lawn chair in hands . puts hand out to follow Mother's hand and then back to her own man and chair . <dur> picks man up from chair and attempts to put in bed . fails at first then succeeds
<1w> picks up man and begins to put in bed . stops and responds to Ruth .
points to man in Mother's hand .
<1w> takes car from dollhouse and puts down by beds
<bef> picks up nesting cup , puts in other nesting cup , repeats
<1w> attempts to pick up both men from beds .
<1w> attempts to put man in car
<aft> picks up other man and puts in car
takes dog out of dollhouse and puts in car
attempts to put nesting cups on beds
<bef> picks up bed and holds it . reaches for car and drops bed . reaches for car again . <dur> pushes car back out of dollhouse
takes lawn chair out of dollhouse
attempts to put one man in bed by lawn chairs
takes bed from dollhouse and puts down by Ruth's bed
puts a man in each bed
takes table from dollhouse and puts down by Ruth
<1w> picks up another man from bed and holds .
<1w> presses both men to table top
picks up grill and drops by table
<bef> picks up man and grill . <dur> stands man on grill in hands
lowers to floor . stands man on grill
points to man's underside and puts finger in hole
<1w> touches Mother's knee and holds out man toward Mother
reaches in dollhouse and rummages . takes chair out and holds
<bef> puts one chair to one side and other chair to other side . <dur> takes chair out of dollhouse
takes another chair out of dollhouse
puts chair on floor with other chairs and arranges them
puts cowboy in chair and holds in hand
takes two benches out and sets to one side on floor
pushes car toward dollhouse with index finger
picks up man from floor and puts in bench
<1w> takes out handful of shape box objects and puts with Ruth's objects
<aft> reaches in shape box and takes out objects
<aft> picks up men and chairs and holds
shuts shape box lid and holds shape box objects
holds out shape box object to Ruth
drops object in hand . takes Mother's object . lowers shape box lid . attempts to put in wrong hole
moves shape box object to correct hole and put through . puts object from one hand to the other
holds out shape box object to Ruth
puts down lawn chair in hand . takes Mother's shape box object . changes hands and puts in shape box . puts hands up in triumph
